hero.title: Luxury Croatian Seaside Apartments
hero.subtitle: Experience the ultimate in coastal living with our exclusive selection of apartments on the stunning island of Brač.

intro.title: An Unforgettable Escape
intro.description: Nestled on the pristine shores of Brač Island, our exclusive collection of luxury apartments offers an unparalleled retreat where Mediterranean elegance meets modern sophistication.

introduction.title: Welcome to Borak Apartments
introduction.description: Nestled on the picturesque island of Brač, Borak Apartments offers a unique blend of luxury, comfort, and authentic Croatian hospitality. Our meticulously designed apartments provide an idyllic retreat for discerning travelers seeking an unforgettable seaside escape.
introduction.highlight1: Prime waterfront location with breathtaking sea views
introduction.highlight2: Luxuriously appointed apartments with modern amenities
introduction.highlight3: Unparalleled access to Brač's pristine beaches and cultural attractions
introduction.highlight4: Personalized service ensuring a seamless and memorable stay

apartmentSelector.title: Our Exclusive Apartments
apartmentSelector.subtitle: Discover our handpicked selection of luxury apartments, each offering a unique blend of style, comfort, and breathtaking views.

location.title: Explore the Beauty of Brač
location.description: Immerse yourself in the captivating charm of Brač, an island renowned for its stunning beaches, crystal-clear waters, and rich cultural heritage. From the iconic Zlatni Rat beach to the historic streets of Supetar, adventure awaits at every turn.

prime.title: Prime Location
prime.description: Steps away from pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters

beach.title: Beach Access
beach.description: Direct access to secluded coves and swimming spots

climate.title: Year-Round Beauty
climate.description: Perfect Mediterranean climate with over 300 sunny days

views.title: Scenic Views
views.description: Breathtaking panoramic views of the Adriatic Sea

discover.title: Discover the Island of Brač
discover.description: Nestled in the heart of the Adriatic, the island of Brač offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, rich history, and modern luxury. From the famous Zlatni Rat beach to ancient stone quarries, every corner of this Croatian paradise holds a story waiting to be discovered.

testimonials.title: What Our Guests Are Saying
testimonials.description: Read firsthand accounts from travelers who have experienced the magic of Borak Apartments. Discover why our commitment to luxury, comfort, and personalized service has earned us a reputation as a premier Croatian destination.

sarah.name: Sarah & Michael Thompson
sarah.text: The most incredible stay we've ever experienced. The apartment was stunning, and the views absolutely breathtaking. We'll definitely be back!

ana.name: Ana & Marko Petković
ana.text: Perfect place for a vacation! The apartment was luxurious and comfortable, and the sea view was unforgettable. Highly recommend!

hans.name: Hans & Greta Mueller
hans.text: Wonderful accommodation with stunning sea views. Everything was perfectly organized and very clean. Thank you!

cta.title: Find Your Perfect Dates
cta.description: Your exclusive Croatian getaway awaits. Experience luxury redefined where the Mediterranean meets modern elegance.

callToAction.title: Indulge in the Ultimate Croatian Escape
callToAction.description: Ready to experience the luxury and beauty of Borak Apartments? Book your stay today and create memories that will last a lifetime.

footer.description: Borak Apartments offers luxury coastal retreats on the island of Brač, Croatia. Experience unparalleled comfort and breathtaking views in our exclusive accommodations.

2.description: Indulge in the luxury of our premium two-bedroom apartment with panoramic ocean vistas. Ideal for families or groups, featuring a full kitchen, multiple balconies, and sophisticated coastal design.

3.description: Experience comfort in our cozy studio apartment with garden views. Perfect for solo travelers or couples, offering modern amenities and a peaceful atmosphere just steps from the beach.

4.description: Discover our spacious family apartment with multiple bedrooms and a large terrace. Designed for larger groups, featuring premium amenities and breathtaking views of the Adriatic coastline.
